pkgmetadata.longdescription:
üêç ‚ÄÅdecamelize: Convert a camelized string into `snake_case`

# Install```$ pip install decamelize```# Why?- Turn `CamelCase` to `non_camel_case`- Clean and focused- Actively maintained## Usage```pyimport decamelizeprint (decamelize.convert("CamelCase"))# Eg: CamelCase ‚Üí camel_case```# Team|[![Carlos Abraham Logo](https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/21347264?s=50&v=4)](https://19cah.com)|| :-: || [Carlos Abraham](https://github.com/abranhe) |# Related- [üê´‚ÄÅToCamelCase](https://github.com/abranhe/tocamelcase): ~~camelize string~~ turn into `camel case`# License[MIT](https://github.com/abranhe/decamelize/blob/master/LICENSE) License ¬© [Carlos Abraham](https://github.com/decamelize/tocamelcase)
